display_name: PSG Results: Calculated - RDI with arousals (>= 3% desaturation)
description: missing if total sleep time is 3 or if studies scored as sleep/wake or where arousals were ignored
calculation: rdim3pa = 60*(hremba3 +hroa3 + hnrba3 + hnroa3 +carba3+ caroa3 + canba3 + canoa3 + oarba3 + oaroa3 + oanba3 + oanoa3 + marbpa3 + maropa3 + manrbpa3 + manropa3)/slpprdp
